name: residency-scheduler-load-tests
description: k6 load testing suite for Residency Scheduler API

scripts.test:all: npm run test:smoke && npm run test:load && npm run test:stress
scripts.test:docker:smoke: docker-compose -f docker-compose.k6.yml --profile load-testing run --rm k6 run /load-tests/scenarios/smoke-test.js
scripts.test:docker:load: docker-compose -f docker-compose.k6.yml --profile load-testing run --rm k6 run /load-tests/scenarios/load-test.js
scripts.test:docker:stress: docker-compose -f docker-compose.k6.yml --profile load-testing run --rm k6 run /load-tests/scenarios/stress-test.js
scripts.test:docker:spike: docker-compose -f docker-compose.k6.yml --profile load-testing run --rm k6 run /load-tests/scenarios/spike-test.js
scripts.test:docker:soak: docker-compose -f docker-compose.k6.yml --profile load-testing run --rm k6 run /load-tests/scenarios/soak-test.js
scripts.metrics:up: docker-compose -f docker-compose.k6.yml --profile load-testing-metrics up -d influxdb grafana-k6
scripts.help:
echo 'Available commands:
  npm run test:smoke - Quick functionality test
  npm run test:load - Standard load test
  npm run test:stress - Stress test to find limits
  npm run test:spike - Spike test for sudden traffic
  npm run test:soak - Long-running stability test
  npm run test:docker:* - Run tests in Docker
  npm run metrics:up - Start InfluxDB + Grafana
  npm run clean - Clean result files'

author: Residency Scheduler Team
